name: CommBI
0:
”Alexa, start Comm BI”
”Alexa, open Comm BI”
”Alexa, launch Comm BI”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: comm b. i.
des: CommBI gives both company leadership and tactical leads the most important information required to run your telecommunications business. Powered by the CommSoft BSS/OSS application suite, CommBI provides regular briefings on all business segments including sales, operations, finance, network operations, and technician dispatch.
